label: Sideload conversation
tooltip: This will sideload a conversation into an already running conversation. Useful for having a top level conversation that loads others based on high level conditions.

inputs.label: Entry Node Id
inputs.tooltip: The node to sideload into the conversation on. If left blank then it will start on the first root.

inputs.label: Resume host after sideload finished
inputs.tooltip: This setting can allow the conversation to resume from this point after the sideloaded conversation has finished.

values.viewlabel: and resume the host conversation on finish
